prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalCuisineExplorer 
Title: Discover the Exotic Flavors of Madagascar: A Gastronomical Journey 
Description: Embark on a culinary voyage to the heart of Madagascar, exploring the unique flavors and ingredients that make up their traditional dishes. Dive into history, culture, and cooking techniques in our comprehensive guide.
Yes, I am.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumMechanics101
Title: Breaking Down the Basics of Quantum Mechanics: An In-Depth Study
Description: Delve into the fascinating world of quantum mechanics with our beginner-friendly guide. We cover everything from the fundamental principles to the latest developments, making complex ideas accessible and engaging.
Yes, I am.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumbGarden 
Title: Urban Gardening for Beginners: How to Grow Your Own Food in Small Spaces 
Description: Learn how to make the most of your urban space with our beginner's guide to urban gardening. We cover everything from choosing the right plants, to optimizing your space and maintaining your garden. Practical tips and advice from urban gardening experts included.
Yes, for sure.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticInsights
Title: Minimalism in Modern Art: An Exploration of Less is More 
Description: Dive into the world of minimalism in modern art. Explore its origins, key figures, and the philosophy of 'less is more'. We also analyze some iconic minimalist works and their impact on the art landscape.
Yes, I would definitely like to know more about minimalism.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AstroEnthusiast 
Title: Uncovering the Mysteries of Dark Matter: A Layman's Guide 
Description: Journey with us through the uncharted territories of the cosmos as we shed light on the elusive dark matter. This comprehensive guide for laypeople simplifies complex astrophysics concepts and brings fascinating astronomical phenomenons to everyday understanding.
Yes, I am.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PoliticalSphere
Title: The Evolution of Political Systems: A Comparative Analysis 
Description: Traverse the timeline of world politics and explore how political systems have evolved over centuries. This detailed analysis compares and contrasts various systems, shedding light on their strengths, weaknesses, and impact on society. Gain a deeper understanding of democracy, monarchy, dictatorship, and more.
No, I am not interested in this article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BioTechToday
Title: The Future of Gene Editing: Ethical Considerations and Potential Implications 
Description: Dive into the controversial world of gene editing with our comprehensive guide. We discuss the latest advancements, ethical concerns, potential implications for humanity, as well as the viewpoints of leading scientists and bioethicists in the field. This piece encourages readers to critically think about the future of biotechnology.
Yes, I would definitely like more information about this.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FashionForward
Title: The Evolution of Sustainable Fashion: A Deep Dive into Eco-friendly Trends 
Description: Explore the changing landscape of the fashion industry as it shifts towards more sustainable practices. We delve into innovative materials, ethical manufacturing, and the brands leading the way in this eco-friendly revolution. This article aims to educate readers about the important role fashion plays in global environmental issues and ways they can contribute to positive change.
Yes, please send me this article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoCurrencyInsights
Title: A Beginner's Guide to Cryptocurrency Mining: Demystifying Blockchain Technology 
Description: Embark on a journey into the digital realm of cryptocurrency mining with this beginner's guide. Understand the complex concepts of blockchain technology, learn about popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum, and get insights on how to start your own mining operation. This guide aims to equip beginners with the knowledge they need to navigate this emerging digital frontier.
Yes, I am.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalRealms
Title: The Enigma of Ancient Civilizations: Decoding the Secrets of Lost Worlds 
Description: Venture into the mysterious world of ancient civilizations with our in-depth exploration. From the architectural wonders of Egypt to the technological advancements of the Mayans, we unravel the secrets of these lost worlds. This captivating article also encompasses the societal structures, religious beliefs, and cultural practices, aiming to provide a comprehensive understanding of our ancestors and their significant contributions to humanity.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FuturisticTech 
Title: Transhumanism and the Future of Humanity: Unveiling the Potential of Brain-Computer Interfaces
Description: Venture beyond the current limitations of human biology with our deep dive into transhumanism, a movement advocating for the use of technology to enhance human intellectual, physical, and psychological capacities. This article specifically focuses on the potential of brain-computer interfaces, devices that allow communication between the human brain and external hardware or software. From restoring sensory and motor function to expanding human cognition, discover how these revolutionary technologies could redefine what it means to be human.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
